scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:web && npm run build:mobile
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shared && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:web && npm run clean:mobile
scripts.clean:web: cd web && rmdir /s /q .next out 2>nul || echo Cleaned
scripts.clean:mobile: cd mobile && rmdir /s /q dist build 2>nul || echo Cleaned
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:web && npm run lint:mobile
